data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: When it comes to a time I promised to do something for someone else, the first thing that springs to my mind is promising to make a birthday cake for my mum this year. Honestly speaking, I have never made a cake before, but I am going to give it a try this December when my mum's birthday comes because I promised to make her a birthday cake by myself last year. To maximize the likelihood of success of it, I started watching videos of cake-making on the internet one month in advance. I even consulted my friend Leon who is pretty good at making cakes. Then I bought all the ingredients I needed and borrowed a mixer from my neighbor because I was only going to use it once. Now, all the preparations have been done, and my mum's birthday is just around the corner. Let's hope everything goes well. (150字)
data.referenceText: Talk about a time you promised to do something for someone else.
data.referenceTranslate: 谈谈你为别人承诺去做的事情。
